name: createReport
description: Creates a Report to which it is possible to associate multiple Checks.

body.description: The params required to create a Report

$ul: **checks**: Path to background check list
**report**: Represents reports
**created_by**: name of the user who created the report
**created_checks_count**: Amount of created checks. Returned only when a file is uploaded
**creation_date**: Report creation date
**has_data**: Indicates whether the report has an associated file
**id**: Report ID
**invalid_checks_count**: number of invalid rows in the uploaded file. Returned only when a file is uploaded
**name**: Report name
**size**: Uploaded file row count. Returned only when a file is uploaded
**update_date**: Latest modification date of the report
